Title: Relates to aggravated unlicensed operation, gives judges discretion to impose lower sentences for second and third degree convictions
Summary: Relates to aggravated unlicensed operation; gives judges discretion to impose lower sentences for second and third degree convictions.
LawCode: Amd ยง511, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to aggravated unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle
